actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the last complete calendar week in April of each year as "National Secretaries' Week" and to proclaim Wednesday of such week as "National Secretaries' Day".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the last complete calendar week in April of each year as "National Secretaries' Week" and to proclaim Wednesday of each week as "National Secretaries' Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the last complete calendar week in April of each year as "National Secretaries' Week" and to proclaim Wednesday of such week as "National Secretaries' Day".
